ygData.subject: A very interesting observation
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I was testing around with my song and I found that the lv1 song is awesome.  I stop using this song after lvl 7.  I am currently lvl 18. When I
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I was testing around with my song and I found that the lv1 song
is awesome. I stop using this song after lvl 7. I am currently lvl 18.
When I twist the chant with lvl 7 song my attack went up by 20 (not dmg) and
my ac went up by 6 and str and dex too. When I tested this out with a orc
warrior last night when I was lvl 17 it was very red to me. It used to be
that a orc would do like 40 dmg per hit but with these 2 songs combine it
was doing like 2 -10 dmg per swing to me. Sometime a 40 dmg but very rare.
it is just too bad that it is red to me that my piercing cannot do that much
dmg too it. I like other plp, just start to realized how cool the new dirk
is. I can hit 3 or four times per tick with a dirk in primary and a combine
ls in secondary when playing the 2 songs mention above. Now I twist the
chant then Warsong then the Bellow. This is so cool. I loved the bard. It
is the most fun class.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
